author: cbs8
title: SheIn Fresh & Stylish Collections Light Up Your Fall & Winter Looks
text:
SheIn Group Ltd.
NANJING , China , Oct. 13, SheIn, former Sheinside, a fashion online store retailing and wholesaling trendy women clothes and accessories, has provided all SheInners with a wide range of stylish fall and winter selection s and are also fully ready to embrace the upcoming Black Friday and Cyber Monday big promotion.
Well, it's sweater and coat season again. But it is not to say that you are in urgent need of wearing heavy coats or countless layers of sweaters. To a large extent, jackets and hooded pieces are the the common choices for the gloomy season. Perhaps you can try something cool to make yourself look much more trendy and keep warm meanwhile. Here are some suggestions for your consideration :
-- Sweater Vest: http://goo.gl/gkUeTf
When it comes to sweater vest, what will first come into your mind? Sleeveless sweater s, jumper s or tank top s ? A majority of people feel that sweaters are only to be worn by men. Sure, men wore them before they became popular with women but sweaters are now becoming ever more popular with females as time goes by. Compared with a sweater or coat, sweater vests are much more suitable and versatile for these cool days. Due to it's simplicity as well as warmth, sweater vest s are considered to be appropriate anytime anywhere and always go very well with a casual shirt. It looks classic so that you never have to worry that it will be out-of- date.
-- Poncho Sweater: http://goo.gl/vEi0Ne
As a kind of loose outerwear, poncho sweater s somewhat represent fashion style among all sweaters because you can see models wearing them on catwalks. If you are bored of traditional sweaters, you can turn your eyes to something new. Poncho sweater s should be regarded as the top priority. We can easily notice that it looks fashionable while staying cozy, comfortable and breathable. Your fall and winter wardrobe should have a "street style" look.
-- Trench Coat: http://goo.gl/1CqTfA
Trench coats are always presented as khaki double-breasted outwear with several buttons and a waist belt. Because they are cozy and warm, many girls are inclined to wear them on cold days. The trench coat is a popular fashion and can be traced back to the early 20th century. Now, trench coat s are worn by everyone including top-class celebrities and college students.
ABOUT SHEIN
SheIn is an online store boasting high quality clothes and other fashionable accessories. Our objective is to be the largest online wardrobe company around the world. We aim to offer our customers a variety of the latest and most fashionable clothing.
For more information please visit: http://goo.gl/C1QkZD
